title: Posting in other boards
body: I can't create a new discussion on other boards. I'm level 11 and it still says "Must be level 7 or higher to create."

replies.body: Sometimes your boards level lags a little behind your actual Summoner level. Once you posted here it forced them to sync up with each other, and I can see that you're level 11 now! You should be good to post wherever your C9 heart desires ^_^!
